Get Niche-DE marker genes(test)

niche_DE_markers.Rd

This function returns genes marker genes in the index cell type when near the first niche cell type realtive to the second one

Usage

niche_DE_markers(object, index, niche1, niche2, alpha = 0.05)

Arguments

object

A niche-DE object

index

The index cell type which we want to find marker genes for

niche1

The niche cell type for the marker genes found

niche2

The niche we wish to compare (index,niche1) patterns to

alpha

The level at which to perform the Benjamini Hochberg correction. Default value is 0.05.

Value

A vector of genes that are niche marker genes for the index cell type near the niche1 cell type relative to the niche2 cell type
